title: blank ssl warnings on client 1.2.0/1.2.1
body:
### expected behaviour client 1.2.0/1.2.1 should connect without errors ### actual behaviour client is able to connect, but throws multiple errors: "warnings about current ssl connection:" and rest of the dialog is blank. warnings can be ignored and connection established ### steps to reproduce 1. configure server with ssl certificate signed using an intermediate certificate 2. connect client to server using https 3. ### server configuration operating system: centos 6.3 (x64) web server: apache/2.2.15 (unix): web server is configured with a verisign issued certificate. verisign certificates are signed with an intermediate certificate. this seems to be the source of the issue, as the error does not occur when using a certificate signed with a private root certificate, as long as said root certificate is installed in the client system's trusted store. database: mysql 5.1.66 php version: 5.3.3 owncloud version: 4.5 ### client configuration browser: na operating system: windows 7 enterprise x32 ### logs #### web server error log ``` insert your webserver log here ``` #### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log) 03-18 15:27:21:075 "################## owncloud en_us (en_us) 1.2.1" 03-18 15:27:21:371 * setup folders from "c:\users\[user deleted]\appdata\local\owncloud/folders" 03-18 15:27:21:371 ` -> setting up: "owncloud" 03-18 15:27:21:371 -> file path: "c:/users/[user deleted]/appdata/local/owncloud/folders/owncloud" 03-18 15:27:21:371 returning configured owncloud url: "https://cloud.example.com/remote.php/webdav/" 03-18 15:27:21:371 setting remote poll timer interval to 28152 msec for folder "owncloud" 03-18 15:27:21:371 * pending events for "c:/users/[user deleted]\owncloud" will be processed after events stop for 1000 milliseconds ( "15:44:01" ). 0 events until now ) 03-18 15:27:21:371 ==> returning exclude file path: "c:/program files/owncloud/sync-exclude.lst" 03-18 15:27:21:371 checked local path ok 03-18 15:27:21:381 ****** owncloud folder using watcher ******* 03-18 15:27:21:381 adding folder to folder map mirall::owncloudfolder(0x272c870) 03-18 15:27:21:381 check status.php from statusdialog. 03-18 15:27:21:381 get request to "status.php" 03-18 15:27:21:381 returning configured owncloud url: "https://cloud.example.com/" 03-18 15:27:21:381 returning configured owncloud url: "https://cloud.example.com/" 03-18 15:27:21:381 setting up host header: "cloud.pmi.edu" 03-18 15:27:21:381 folder in overallstatus message: mirall::owncloudfolder(0x272c870) with name "owncloud" 03-18 15:27:21:381 sync state changed for folder "owncloud" : "not yet started" 03-18 15:27:21:381 folder: mirall::owncloudfolder(0x272c870) 03-18 15:27:21:381 ==> load folder icon "owncloud-framed" 03-18 15:27:21:381 returning configured owncloud url: "https://cloud.example.com/remote.php/webdav/" 03-18 15:27:21:391 check status.php from statusdialog. 03-18 15:27:21:391 get request to "status.php" 03-18 15:27:21:391 returning configured owncloud url: "https://cloud.example.com/" 03-18 15:27:21:391 returning configured owncloud url: "https://cloud.example.com/" 03-18 15:27:21:391 setting up host header: "cloud.pmi.edu" 03-18 configured owncloud url: "https://cloud.example.com/" 03-18 15:27:21:391 setting up host header: "cloud.pmi.edu" 03-18 15:27:21:451 ssl-warnings happened for url "https://cloud.example.com/status.php"
